vulnerabilities.title: Raneto vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
vulnerabilities.description: Renato v0.17.0 was discovered to contain a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. This issue is fixed in version 0.17.1.

vulnerabilities.title: Raneto Denial of Service via crafted payload injected into `Search` parameter
vulnerabilities.description: An issue in Renato v0.17.0 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted payload injected into the `Search` parameter.

vulnerabilities.title: Raneto v0.17.0 employs weak password complexity requirements
vulnerabilities.description: Raneto v0.17.0 employs weak password complexity requirements, allowing attackers to crack user passwords via brute-force attacks. Version 0.17.1 contains security mitigations for this and other vulnerabilities.
